metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13420 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Google gperftools 2.7 has a memory leak in malloc_extension.cc, related to MallocExtension::Register and InitModule. NOTE: the software maintainer indicates that this is not a bug; it is only a false-positive report from the LeakSanitizer program.

notes.Note: leosilva> from github comments it was classified as a false positive adding the ignored flag.

criterions.comment: google-perftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
